allownotificationsText: 알림을 허용하면 지불 및 기부 내역을 알 수 있습니다.
somethingWrongWithPurchase: 구매하는 동안 문제가 발생했습니다. 귀하의 계정에 요금을 청구하지 않았습니다. 다시 시도하십시오.
ThisProcess60Minutes: 이 프로세스는 TUBE가 사용 가능해질 때까지 최대 60분이 걸릴 수 있습니다.
toResendNewEmail: 비밀번호를 복구하기 위해 새 이메일을 다시 보냅니다
sorryYouTriedWrongChannel: 죄송합니다 잘못 된 채널 접속을 하고 계십니다l.

landingPage.title: 인터넷에서 새로운 가치 공유 방법에 참여
landingPage.text: 당신의 시간을 모니터하시고 당신의 웹서핑에 대한 보상을 받으세요. 어디서든 상품과 서비스를 구입하고 당신이 좋아하는 퍼블리셔를 서포팅하세요.
landingPage.footer: 비트튜브 브라우저 확장은 광고 없이 전세계 웹사이트와 사용자에게 수익을 주는 혁신적인 제품입니다.

toVerifyAccountPlaceCodeFacebook: 새 게시물에 있는 코드를 포함한 페이스북 페이지를 확인하려면, 페이스북 프로필에 공개 정보를 입력하세요”
toVerifyAccountPlaceCodeSoundcloud: 계정을 확인하려면 'Edit-Bio' 아래의 사운드 클라우드 프로파일에서 이 코드를 입력해 주십시오.'.
onceYouPasteCode: 프로필에 코드를 붙여 넣고 '지금 인증'버튼을 클릭하십시오.
toVerifyDomain: 도메인을 확인하려면 다음 txt 파일을 다운로드하여 도메인의 공용 폴더에 넣습니다.
anErrorHasOccured: 계정을 연결하는 동안 오류가 발생했습니다. 나중에 다시 해 주세요.
theCodeInYourProfile: 프로필의 코드가 잘못되었거나 찾을 수 없습니다. 올바른 코드를 붙여넣은 후 다시 시도하세요.
theCodeUnderDomain: 도메인의 코드가 잘못되었거나 존재하지 않습니다. 파일을 공용 폴더 아래에 놓고 다시 시도하세요.
phoneNumberAlreadyUsed: 전화번호는 이미 레퍼런스 보상을 위해 사용되었습니다.

Web.browserNotallow: Your browser doesn't allow extensions on mobile. Use BitTube, Firefox, Kiwi or Yandex browsers.
Web.deviceNotallow: This device does not support browser extensions.
Web.CookiesHome: 우리가 GDPR을 준수하는 것을 돕기 위해, 우리는 귀하에게 쿠키에 대한 선택을 해 줄 것을 요청합니다.
Web.CookiesHomeB: 우리는 페이지 탐색, 언어 선호도, 온라인 지원과 같은 기본적인 기능을 가능하게 하는 필수 쿠키를 사용합니다. 이러한 쿠키가 없으면 웹 사이트가 제대로 작동할 수 없습니다..
Web.copyrigth: 저작권은© 2020 BitTube에 있으며 무단 사용을 금지합니다.

Index.monetizeYourTime: BitTube 브라우저 익스텐션을 사용하면 어디에서나 웹을 검색하는 동안 시간을 절약할 수 있습니다!
Index.earnTUBEsText: AirTime을 통해 온라인 활동을 기준으로 TUBE를 획득합니다. 소셜 계정 및 웹 사이트를 연결합니다. 출판사에 기부하고, 누구에게든 거래를 하고, 수입을 현지 통화로 전환하세요..
Index.blockAdsText: 등록인의 수익에 타격을 줄 염려 없이 무료이며 무료입니다. 이 시스템은 새로 방문한 계정 또는 웹 사이트를 위한 전용 지갑을 즉시 생성합니다.
Index.DonationsText: 확장 기능에는 모든 주요 플랫폼에서 즉시 기부할 수 있는 "TUBEs" 버튼이 기본적으로 포함되어 있습니다. 웹 사이트를 방문할지 또는 소셜 프로필 피드를 방문할지 여부를 인식합니다.
Index.VPNText: 원격 서버에 연결하여 지오 제한 콘텐츠에 액세스하고 익명으로 보다 안전하게 웹 서핑할 수 있습니다. 활성화된 경우, VPN 서비스는 AirTime 보상에 의해 보조됩니다.
Index.integratedWalletText: 여러 주소를 관리하고, 익스텐션 에서 직접 자금을 송수신합니다. 연결된 계정 및 웹 사이트에서 트랜잭션 기록을 가져오고 수익을 모니터링합니다. 비밀 키를 사용하여 데스크톱 또는 모바일 지갑 앱에서 온라인 지갑을 복원합니다.
Index.Step1: 익스텐션 에서 BitTube 계정 메뉴를 엽니다
Index.glossaryText1: 새로운 발명품들은 항상 새로운 단어와 용어와 함께 옵니다. 다음은 우리가 사용하는 특정 단어에 대한 간단한 설명입니다.
Index.airtimeModelText1: 인터넷 검색 시간을 기준으로 TUBE 유틸리티 토큰을 통해 사용자에게 보상을 제공하는 시스템입니다.
Index.viewOnlyWalletText1: TUBE 잔액만 보이거나 결제를 받는 데 사용할 수 있습니다. 송금이 비활성화되었습니다.
Index.glossaryAirtimeText1: 브라우저 확장을 사용하도록 설정한 상태에서 인터넷에서 보낸 총 시간입니다.
Index.GlossarywalletAddress: (은행 계좌와 같은) 자금을 받기 위한 고유 주소입니다. 공용 키라고도 합니다.
Index.privateKeyText1: 지갑은 공용 키로 표시되지만 프라이빗 키는 디지털 서명 역할을 하므로 보호해야 할 암호입니다.
Index.viewKeyText1: 보기 전용 지갑에 액세스하는 데 사용되는 일련의 번호와 문자입니다.
Index.confirmationText1: 비트튜브 트랜잭션이 발생하면 블록 체인이 트랜잭션의 유효성을 확인합니다. 확인은 120초마다 이루어지며, 최소 10번의 확인 후에 확인됩니다.

Prod.airtimeText: 확장을 실행하는 모든 사용자는 AirTime을 생성합니다. 이는 웹 페이지에 소비하는 시간을 보상해 줍니다. 소셜 계정을 포함한 이러한 페이지의 게시자는 방문 시 총 에어 타임(AirTime)을 기준으로 수익을 얻습니다.
Prod.LinkAccountText: 웹 사이트나 소셜 미디어 계정을 비트튜브 계정에 연결합니다. 다른 비트튜브 확장 사용자로부터 얻습니다..
Prod.LinkAccountTextB: 비 BitTube 게스트 사용자로부터 웹 사이트에서 AirTime 수익을 설정하려면 '플랫폼 등록'으로 이동합니다. 더 자세히 알아보기
Prod.BlockAdvertisementsText: 온라인 환경을 개선하고 인터넷 침입 광고, 팝업 및 추적을 없앨 수 있습니다. 페이지를 더 빨리 로드하고, 대역폭을 저장하고, 화이트리스트를 관리합니다.
Prod.VPNforFreeText: 필요한 경우 원격 서버에 연결하십시오. 지리적으로 제한된 콘텐츠에 액세스하고 익명으로 웹 서핑을 즐기십시오. 추적이 필요없고 구독이 필요없고 캐치가 필요 없습니다.
Prod.MyWalletText: 당신만의 은행을 계설하세요. 당신은 지불 제공자로부터 독립한 당신의 자금의 소유자입니다. 모든 TUBE 자금을 안전하게 관리하기 위해 여러 개의 지갑을 설치하세요.
Prod.BuyTUBEsText: 은행 송금, 기타 암호화폐 또는 신용 카드를 사용하여 TUBE를 구매하십시오. TUBE가 승인 된 서비스 또는 제품에 대한 추가 할인 및 할인 혜택 계정 "아래의 내 TUBE 변환 "을 통해 귀하의 은행 "계좌로" 직접 인출하십시오 탭.
Prod.MobileWalletText: 아이폰 및 안드로이드에 사용할 수 있는 비트튜브 지갑 응용 프로그램은 확장 계정과 동기화됩니다. 각각의 연결된 계정 또는 도메인 전용 지갑을 관리하고 TUBE를 다른 사용자에게 보냅니다. QR 코드 기능을 사용하여 손쉽게 자금을 거래할 수 있습니다.
Prod.DesktopWalletText: 그래픽 사용자 인터페이스 (GUI) 지갑에는 기능, 사용자 정의 기본 설정 및 통합 된 마이닝 소프트웨어가 있습니다. 이 지갑을 사용하면 비밀 키 또는 니모닉 시드를 사용하여 주소를 복원 할 수 있습니다. 자금을 저장하는 가장 안전한 방법입니다. 전용 주소록은 자주 사용되는 주소를 저장할 수 있습니다. 다운로드하려면 아래에서 OS를 선택하십시오..
Prod.WooCommerceText: 지불 게이트웨이 플러그인을 사용하여 WordPress 매장에 비트튜브 결제를 추가하십시오. 그것을 귀하의 비트튜브 계정에 연결하고 신속하고 수수료없는 지불을 수락하십시오. 실시간 환율을 기반으로 현지 통화를 TUBE로 자동 변환 가능 합니다.
Prod.BittubeMobileAppDescription: The video platform in your hands. Watch and post content easily from your mobile device.

airtime.Instant: 인스턴트, 사용자 친화적 인 글로벌 소액 결제 솔루션
airtime.HowWorksText: 유지 관리하는 웹 사이트 및 앱에서 수입을 관리 할 수있는 단일 대시 보드. AirTime 모듈은 비트튜브 게스트 방문자의 세션 시간에 따라 보상 할 수 있습니다. 비트튜브 생태계에 손님을 초대하여 수익을 극대화하십시오.
airtime.HowWorksTextB: 다음 세 가지 간단한 단계를 따라 오늘 바로 AirTime의 혜택을 누리시기 바랍니다.
airtime.InstallText: 원하는 브라우저에 확장자를 추가합니다. 등록하고 "Links" 탭을 엽니다. 여기에 소셜 계정 및 웹 사이트를 연결합니다.
airtime.Give: 웹 사이트, 플랫폼 또는 앱에 이름 지정
airtime.GiveText: 여기에 AirTime 모듈로 플랫폼을 등록하십시오. 설치된 모듈에 대한 지갑 식별에 도움이되는 고유 한 이름을 정의하십시오. 원하는만큼의 도메인을 추가하십시오.
airtime.GetText: 지침이 담긴 코드를 받게됩니다. 코딩 기술이 필요하지 않습니다. HTML 본문에 코드를 복사하여 붙여 넣기 만하면 나머지는 AirTime에서 처리합니다.
airtime.AdvantagesText: 비트튜브 AirTime 모듈을 사용하면 방문자에게 무료 서비스를 제공할 수 있는 동시에 온라인 수익을 완벽하게 관리할 수 있습니다.
airtime.IndependentText: 비트튜브는 블록체인을 기반으로합니다. 따라서 귀하는 생성 된 기금의 유일한 소유주이며 어디서나 거래 및 교환 할 수 있으며 현지 통화로 전환 할 수 있습니다.
airtime.AdFreeText: 방문객을 기쁘게 하는 깨끗하고 애드프리 웹 디자인으로 창의력을 발휘합니다. 비트튜브 에코시스템 내에서 새로운 사용자를 끌어옵니다.
airtime.prerequisitesText: 광고 네트워크 및 광고주 정책과는 별개로 웹 사이트의 첫 번째 방문부터 수익을 올립니다. 수익은 AirTime을 기준으로 하여 전 세계적으로 공평합니다.
airtime.audienceText: 가장 충성스러운 사용자로부터 직접 기부 및 구독 서비스를 받을 수 있습니다. 작업을 보호하고 온디맨드 방식으로 컨텐츠에 액세스할 수 있습니다.
airtime.TechnologyAirTimeText: 블록 체인의 힘을 활용하고 방문자의 관심과 세션 시간에 가장 귀중한 자원으로부터 수익을 창출하십시오 .WebTime 모듈을 처음 사용하십니까? 이미 비트튜브 익스텐션을 사용하는지 확인하십시오!
airtime.TechnologyAppText: 마찰없이 앱 구매 및 게임 내 통화 배포 즉시 거래를 통해 사용자 획득, 상호 작용 및 참여를 촉진하십시오
airtime.TechnologyPaywallText: 마찰 없이 액세스할 수 있는 웹 사이트의 온디맨드 콘텐츠 및 구독 기반 페이지를 제공합니다. 우수한 사용자 경험을 통해 양질의 콘텐츠를 제공하는 데 초점을 맞춥니다.

Brand.BrandResourcesB: 당사의 브랜드와 디자인 요소의 적절한 적용에 대해 자세히 알아보세요.
Brand.BrandResourcesC: 모든 로고, 아이콘, 배지 및 브랜드 지침을 보려면 아래의 프레스 키트를 다운로드합니다.
Brand.LogoText: 로고는 즉시 알아볼 수 있는 브랜드의 상징입니다. 그렇기 때문에 이 지침에 명시된 대로 정확하게 로고를 사용하는 것이 중요합니다.
Brand.IconText: 아이콘은 요소의 위치를 ​​표시하는 4 개의 동심원, 삼각형의 Play 기호 또는 중앙의 지갑, 기호의 오른쪽 상단에있는 곡선 및이 요소를 둘러싸는 배경 원으로 구성됩니다.
Brand.donot: 로고 및 아이콘으로 수행할 수 없는 작업
Brand.donotText: 애플리케이션의 일관성을 유지하려면 리소스 아래의 로고 섹션에 제공된 대로 로고를 사용해야 합니다. 로고는 모양, 구성 요소, 색상, 비율 또는 기타 속성 측면에서 다시 작성하거나 변경해서는 안 됩니다.
Brand.IncludeBadge: 연결된 모든 웹 사이트에 배지를 포함시키고 연결된 소셜 계정에 있는 Airtime 게시물을 수익화를 위한 명확한 영업 활용 방안으로 사용합니다.
Brand.ColorText: 우리 회사의 색깔은 우리 정체성의 뚜렷하고 중요한 부분입니다. 그들은 우리 브랜드를 즉시 알아볼 수 있게 합니다. 일관성 있게 적용할 경우, 당사의 기업 색상은 경쟁업체와 차별화되는 제품, 플랫폼, 게시자, 콘텐츠 및 서비스에 대한 강력한 시각적 연결을 제공합니다.
Brand.TheCoinText: The coin icon "TUBE" is formed by a T with two horizontal lines that cross it. You’re allowed to scale the icon but it must remain legible, check minimum size at brand guidelines. The coin has a font that you can download with the press kit. You're not allowed to skew, distort or modify the icon in any other way.

Coin.introCoinA: BitTube coin (TUBE) is a private cryptocurrency based on the CN Saber (CN Heavy Variant) Proof-of-Work algorithm without Premine or a ICO. Professional GPU miners secure the blockchain network, earning them block rewards that serve as the lifeblood of the entire ecosystem. A fixed share of the block reward is allocated for Airtime payouts. Learn more about mining in our
Coin.introCoinB: TUBE is a Monero fork. It currently has a healthy network with roughly 1000 active miners.
Coin.introCoinC: Emission decrease is smooth: there is no halving for TUBE. It's very easy for new users toget access to TUBE since all that's required is basically browse the web. Currently there is no hardware wallet support.
Coin.exchangesContent: Buy TUBE direct at the BitTube extension with Credit/Debit card, wire transfer or other cryptocurrencies.
Coin.name: Name:
Coin.coinAlgorithimR: Cryptonight Saber in favor to GPU miners. ASIC’s, CPU or FPGA’s are not efficient to mine TUBE
Coin.premineCon: A predetermined block reward amount written into the code by the developer, usually released on block 1.
Coin.emissionCon: The amount of coins distributed over a set period of time.
Coin.bountieCon: Coins or tokens given away by the developer to the community either for a service or for participation in the project.
Coin.supplyCon: The maximum amount of coins that will be ever released.
Coin.explorerCon: The maximum amount of coins that will be ever released.
Coin.sourceC-1: Around 40O TUBE. Progressively diminishing rewards with each block.
Coin.sourceD: Average reward per block for the next 365 days:
Coin.sourceD-1: Around 375 TUBE. 45% of block reward distributed via AirTime to publishers and viewers with a 75/25 split.
Coin.mobile: Wallet app makes mobile payments easy.
Coin.slogan: TUBE is a new kind of money that provides a modern payment network.

Web.PrivacyText1: BitTube endeavor to adhere to the following privacy policy with respect to the operation and use of our website and extension.
Web.PrivacyText2: We take your privacy seriously and want you to understand exactly what information we collect, how we use that information, which pieces of information you can request us to remove, and how to contact us about this policy. Please read this policy carefully. Your continued use of our extensions and/or website constitutes your agreement to this policy.
Web.PrivacyText4: We collect several types of information, such as:
Web.PrivacyText6: Our services captures anonymous usage information, including but not limited to: current version of the extension, preferred language, number of blocked requests, and browser and operating system type.
Web.PrivacyText9: You may provide us with a name and e-mail address.
Web.PrivacyText10: To verify that you are human we ask you for a phone number and perform a check via in-call verification code submission.
Web.PrivacyText12: Certain none PII Website activity information is automatically collected and logged by our servers. Such information includes IP address used to connect user's computer to the Internet, username (if applicable), date and time of visit, length of visits to certain pages.
Web.PrivacyText13b: For more information check our Cookies Policy.
Web.PrivacyText14: We use cookies for the purpose of your connection and session on our Website's servers, distinguish you from other users of our Website, obtaining Website activity and in some cases for security and authentication purposes.
Web.PrivacyText15: Unless BitTube and you agree otherwise, any arbitration hearings will take place in a reasonably convenient location for both parties with due consideration of their ability to travel and other pertinent circumstances. If the parties are unable to agree on a location, the determination shall be made by DIS. If your claim is for €10,000 or less, BitTube agrees that you may choose whether the arbitration will be conducted solely on the basis of documents submitted to the arbitrator, through a telephonic hearing, or by an in-person hearing as established by the DIS Rules. If your claim exceeds €10,000, the right to a hearing will be determined by the DIS Rules. Regardless of the manner in which the arbitration is conducted, the arbitrator shall issue a reasoned written decision sufficient to explain the essential findings and conclusions on which the award is based.
Web.PrivacyText17: Our services uses various analytics services to aggregate information about traffic patterns and how our website and extension are used.
Web.PrivacyText18: Information we receive from other sources
Web.PrivacyText19: We may receive none PII about you if you use any of the other websites we operate or the other services we provide.
Web.PrivacyText20: How our services uses and discloses collected information
Web.PrivacyText21: We use the collected usage and analytics information to maintain and improve the our extension and website and gain insight into how our services are being used. Our services sometimes share anonymized and aggregated information that cannot be associated with an individual with third parties or the public.
Web.PrivacyText23: We took measures to protect the security of your email from loss, misuse, unauthorized access or disclosure, alteration, or destruction.
Web.PrivacyText24: All anonymous usage information that our services collects is stored in our databases and we takes reasonable steps to keep it secure. That said, no database or server is 100% secure and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data in our system or while being transmitted over the Internet. Our best effort is given, but you use our services at your own risk.
Web.PrivacyText25: Changes and updates to this policy
Web.PrivacyText26: We reserves the right to change this policy for any reason, and may make small, inconsequential changes to this policy with or without notice. Each time this policy is changed we will revise the "Effective Date" at the top of this page. Your continued use of the our services constitutes your agreement to this Privacy Policy and any revisions or updates.
Web.PrivacyTextGoogleHeading: Information from Integrated Services like Facebook or Google
Web.PrivacyTextGoogleText: If you decide to register through or otherwise grant access to a third-party social networking or integrated service (what we call an "Integrated Services"), such as Facebook Connect or Google. BitTube may also collect Personal Information that is already associated with your Integrated Service account. You may also have the option of sharing additional information with BitTube through an Integrated Service. If you choose to provide such information during registration or otherwise, you are giving BitTube the permission to use and store it in a manner consistent with this Privacy Policy.
Web.TermsOfService: Terms of Service and user Agreement
Web.TermsOfServiceText1: Together with its subsidiaries and other affiliates, BitTube, makes available the "Site" (websites including, without limitation,
Web.TermsOfServiceText2: and all sub-domains), "Software" (software and mobile applications), and "Services" (including, without limitation, cryptocurrency services) to help people share value more effectively. Access to and use of BitTube’s existing Site, Software and Services, as well as any future Sites, Software or Services provided by BitTube are governed by this Terms of Service and License Agreement (this "Agreement").
Web.TermsOfServiceText3: THIS IS A LEGALLY BINDING AGREEMENT. IF YOU DO NOT UNDERSTAND THIS AGREEMENT, OR DO NOT AGREE TO BE BOUND BY IT OR THE PRIVACY POLICY REFERENCED HEREIN, YOU MUST IMMEDIATELY LEAVE THE SITE AND YOU ARE NOT AUTHORIZED TO ACCESS OR USE ANY OF THE SERVICES OR SOFTWARE. BY ACCESSING OR USING THE SITE, SERVICES AND/OR SOFTWARE, YOU CONFIRM THAT YOU ARE AT LEAST 18 YEARS OLD (OR IF YOU ARE BETWEEN 13 AND 17 YEARS OLD, INCLUSIVE, THAT YOU ARE USING THE SITE, SERVICES AND/OR SOFTWARE ONLY WITH THE APPROVAL OF YOUR PARENT OR GUARDIAN), THAT YOU ARE LEGALLY ABLE TO ENTER INTO THIS AGREEMENT, AND THAT YOU HAVE READ, UNDERSTAND AND AGREE TO BE BOUND BY THIS AGREEMENT.
Web.TermsOfServiceText4: If you are an individual, or are accessing the Site to use the Services or Software, or are otherwise browsing the Site, this Agreement is between you, individually, and BitTube.
Web.TermsOfServiceText5: If you are an employee, faculty member or student of a university, school or other entity or organization that has implemented Airtime, the Services and Software (an "publisher"), you are an "owner" of your user and (i) you represent that you have your user’s permission and authority to use the Site, Services, Software and your publisher’s "User Content" (as defined below) subject to this Agreement, (ii) this Agreement is an agreement between you, individually, and BitTube, and (iii) your publisher is jointly responsible for your use of the Site, Services and Software.
Web.TermsOfServiceText6: If you are entering into this Agreement on behalf of an publisher, you represent that you have the authority to bind the Enterprise Subscriber to this Agreement, in which case references to "you" in this Agreement shall mean the publisher, website owner. If you do not have such authority, you must not accept this Agreement and may not use the Site, Software or Services.
Web.TermsOfServiceText7: THIS AGREEMENT CONTAINS AN ARBITRATION AGREEMENT, WHICH WILL, WITH LIMITED EXCEPTIONS, REQUIRE YOU TO SUBMIT CLAIMS YOU HAVE AGAINST BitTube AND ITS LICENSORS AND ITS SUPPLIERS TO BINDING AND FINAL ARBITRATION. UNDER THE ARBITRATION AGREEMENT (1) YOU WILL ONLY BE PERMITTED TO PURSUE CLAIMS AGAINST BitTube AND ITS LICENSORS AND ITS SUPPLIERS ON YOUR OWN BEHALF, NOT AS A PLAINTIFF OR CLASS MEMBER IN ANY CLASS OR REPRESENTATIVE ACTION OR PROCEEDING, (2) YOU WILL ONLY BE PERMITTED TO SEEK RELIEF (INCLUDING MONETARY, INJUNCTIVE, AND DECLARATORY RELIEF) ON YOUR OWN BEHALF, AND (3) YOU ARE WAIVING YOUR RIGHT TO A JURY TRIAL AND YOUR RIGHT TO HAVE YOUR CLAIMS DECIDED BY A JUDGE OR JURY.
Web.TermsOfServiceText9: If you are an individual user: In consideration for your acceptance of this Agreement, BitTube grants you a personal, limited, non-exclusive, non-sublicensable, non-transferable, revocable license to access and use the Site, the Services and the Software solely for your own personal purposes.

In addition, you may permit such number of Authorized Users as has been agreed between you and BitTube to access and make use of the Site, Services and Software.
Web.TermsOfServiceText11: If you are an Authorized User: In consideration for your agreement, BitTube grants you a personal, limited, non-exclusive, non-sublicensable, non-transferable, revocable license to access and make use of the Site, the Services and the Software solely for the internal business purposes. You may access and use the Site, Services and Software only in accordance with any instruction manuals, user guides and other documentation as made available by BitTube from time to time ("Documentation").
Web.TermsOfServiceText13: copy, modify or create derivative works based on the Site, Services, Software or Documentation, or any portion(s) of any of the foregoing

Web.TermsOfServiceText16: transfer to any third party any of your rights under this Agreement
Web.TermsOfServiceText17: access or use the Services, Software or BitTube IP for the benefit of any third party
Web.TermsOfServiceText18: access content or data not intended for you, log onto a server or account that you are not authorized to access, or otherwise violate or attempt to violate any security or authentication feature or measures of the Site, Software or Services;
Web.TermsOfServiceText19: attempt to access or derive the source code or architecture of any Software;
Web.TermsOfServiceText20: attempt to probe, scan or test the vulnerability of the Site, Services and/or Software, or any associated system or network, or to breach any security or authentication feature or measures of the Site, Software or Services (except with BitTube’s express permission in connection with your participation in one of BitTube’s security testing programs), and if you are blocked by BitTube from accessing the Site, Software or Services (including by blocking your IP address), you will not implement any measures to circumvent such blocking (e.g., by masking your IP address or using a proxy IP address);
Web.TermsOfServiceText21: interfere or attempt to interfere with service to any user, host or network, including, without limitation, by means of submitting malicious software or computer code ("Malicious Code") to the Site or Services, load testing, overloading, "flooding," "spamming," "mail bombing," "crashing,";
Web.TermsOfServiceText22: email or otherwise transmit any content that (i) infringes any intellectual property or other proprietary rights of any party; (ii) you do not have a right to upload under any law or under contractual or fiduciary relationships; (iii) contains any Malicious Code, files or programs designed to interrupt, destroy or limit the functionality of any computer software or hardware or telecommunications equipment; (iv) poses or creates a privacy or security risk to any person or entity; (v) constitutes unsolicited or unauthorized materials; or (vi) is otherwise objectionable;
Web.TermsOfServiceText23: automate access to the Site or the Services, including, without limitation, through the use of APIs, bots, scrapers or other similar devices;
Web.TermsOfServiceText24: export or re-export any BitTube IP;
Web.TermsOfServiceText25: use or access any Services, Software or BitTube IP in order to build a competitive product, service or solution;
Web.TermsOfServiceText26: violate any applicable law or regulations in connection with your use of the Site, Services or Software;
Web.TermsOfServiceText27: impersonate any person or entity, or falsely state or otherwise misrepresent your affiliation with a person or entity, including, without limitation, a website owner; or
Web.TermsOfServiceText28: permit any third party to do any of the foregoing.
Web.TermsOfServiceText29: BitTube may offer certain Software, including certain interfaces, for download from the Site ("Ancillary Software"). Subject to the other terms and conditions of this Agreement, you may install and use Ancillary Software on computers owned, leased or otherwise controlled by you, solely in conjunction with your authorized use of the Services. Upon expiration or termination of this Agreement for any reason, you shall cease any further use of the Ancillary Software and shall promptly destroy all copies thereof in your possession.

In such cases, the applicable Specific Terms will be made available to you and your access to and use of the relevant Services or Software will be contingent upon your acceptance of and compliance with such Specific Terms.

Web.TermsOfServiceText34: You shall be solely responsible for the security and proper use of all user IDs, passwords or other security devices used in connection with the Site and/or the Services, and shall take all reasonable steps to ensure that they are kept confidential and secure, are used properly and are not disclosed to or used by any other person or entity. Web.TermsOfServiceText37: You are responsible for obtaining and maintaining any equipment and ancillary services needed to connect to or access the Site or otherwise use the Services, including, without limitation, modems, hardware, software, internet service and telecommunications capacity. You shall be solely responsible for ensuring that such equipment and ancillary services are compatible with the Services and Software.
Web.TermsOfServiceText39: The Site, Software and Services may include products and services that are available via a mobile device, including (i) the ability to send/receive transactions to the Services via a mobile device, (ii) the ability to browse the Services and the Site from a mobile device, and (iii) the ability to access certain features through an application downloaded and installed on a mobile device (collectively, "Mobile Services"). To the extent you access the Service through a mobile device, your wireless service carrier’s standard charges, data rates and other fees may apply. In addition, downloading, installing or using certain Mobile Services may be prohibited or restricted by your carrier, and not all Mobile Services may work with all carriers or devices. By using the Mobile Services, you agree that BitTube may communicate with you regarding BitTube and other entities by electronic means to your mobile device and that certain information about your usage of the Mobile Services may be communicated to us. In the event you change or deactivate your mobile telephone number, you agree to promptly update your account information to ensure that your messages are not sent to the person that acquires your mobile telephone number.
Web.TermsOfServiceText41: You are solely responsible for all cryptocurrency transactions, entered or otherwise transmitted by you in connection with your use of the Services and/or Software. BitTube has no obligation to monitor any user transactions and shall have no liability to you or any other person or entity with respect thereto, including, without limitation, liability with respect to any law infringement. You warrant, represent and covenant that you respect any applicable law, rule or regulation of any government authority of competent jurisdiction. You are solely responsible for saving, storing and otherwise maintaining User funds including by maintaining backup copies of your private key on appropriate independent systems that do not rely on the Services and/or Software.

Web.TermsOfServiceText45: It is your responsibility to review the Terms of Service and End User License Agreement periodically. "We ("Company", "us", "we") endeavor to adhere to the following privacy policy with respect to the operation and use of our website and extension ("our services").

If you choose to access third party websites or obtain products or services from third parties, you do so entirely at your own risk and such access is between you and such third party. Web.TermsOfServiceText49: Your registration to use the Site and/or Services constitutes your consent to receive email communications from BitTube, including messages regarding customer service issues and other matters. You may opt not to receive email correspondence, other than technical notifications and email regarding issues related to your account and your use of the Site and Services, at any time by following the link included in the email messages.
Web.TermsOfServiceText51: BitTube does not collect personally identifiable information from you except to the extent you have explicitly given such information to BitTube. BitTube’s information practices are further described in its privacy policy, which is available at:
Web.TermsOfServiceText52: (the "Privacy Policy"). The Privacy Policy is an integral part of this Agreement and is expressly incorporated by reference, and by entering into this Agreement you agree to (i) all of the terms of the Privacy Policy, and (ii) BitTube’s use of data as described in the Privacy Policy is not an actionable breach of your privacy or publicity rights.
Web.TermsOfServiceText53: BitTube may from time to time update or revise the Privacy Policy. If BitTube updates or revises the Privacy Policy, BitTube will notify you either by email to your most recently provided email address, by posting the updated or revised Privacy Policy on the Site or by any other manner chosen by BitTube in its commercially reasonable discretion. Your use of the Site, Services or Software following any such update or revision constitutes your agreement to be bound by and comply with the Privacy Policy as updated or revised.
Web.TermsOfServiceText54: In addition, BitTube may engage third parties to conduct risk control and fraud detection/prevention activities. As part of such engagements, if you initiate a transaction on the Site or through the Services, BitTube may give such third parties access to your pertinent credit card and other personal information. Such third parties may only use such personal information for purposes of performing risk control and fraud detection/prevention activities for us. However, they may also convert such personal information into hashed or encoded representations of such information to be used for statistical and/or fraud prevention purposes. By initiating any such transaction, you hereby consent to the foregoing disclosure and use of your information.
Web.TermsOfServiceText56: You shall indemnify, release and hold harmless BitTube and its parents, subsidiaries, affiliates, licensors and suppliers, and each of their respective officers, directors, employees and agents, from and against any loss, liability (including settlements, judgments, fines and penalties) and costs (including reasonable attorney fees, court costs and other litigation expenses) relating to any claim or demand made by any third party due to or arising out of your access to the Site, use of the Services or Software, violation of this Agreement, or infringement of any intellectual property or other right of any person or entity. If you are a California resident, you waive California Civil Code Section 1542, which says: "A general release does not extend to claims which the creditor does not know or suspect to exist in his favor at the time of executing the release, which if known by him must have materially affected his settlement with the debtor." If you are a resident of another jurisdiction, you waive any comparable statute or doctrine.
Web.TermsOfServiceText58: O THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, BitTube, ITS LICENSORS AND ITS SUPPLIERS EXPRESSLY DISCLAIM ANY AND ALL WARRANTIES AND CONDITIONS, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, REGARDING THE SITE, SERVICES, AND SOFTWARE, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, ANY IMPLIED WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF MERCHANTABILITY, MERCHANTABLE QUALITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE, NONINFRINGEMENT, SATISFACTORY QUALITY OR ARISING FROM A COURSE OF DEALING, LAW, USAGE, OR TRADE PRACTICE, OR REGARDING SECURITY, QUIET ENJOYMENT, RELIABILITY, TIMELINESS AND PERFORMANCE. Web.TermsOfServiceText63: PLEASE READ THIS SECTION CAREFULLY AS IT AFFECTS YOUR RIGHTS.
Web.TermsOfServiceText65: This Section titled "Dispute resolution by binding arbitration" is referred to in this Agreement as the "Arbitration Agreement." You agree that any and all disputes or claims that have arisen or may arise between you and BitTube, whether arising out of or relating to this Agreement (including any alleged breach thereof), the Site, Software or Services, any advertising or any aspect of the relationship or transactions between us, shall be resolved exclusively through final and binding arbitration, rather than a court, in accordance with the terms of this Arbitration Agreement, except that you may assert individual claims in small claims court, if your claims qualify. Further, this Arbitration Agreement does not preclude you from bringing issues to the attention of federal, state, or local agencies, and such agencies can, if the law allows, seek relief against us on your behalf. You agree that, by entering into this Agreement, you and BitTube are each waiving the right to a trial by jury or to participate in a class action. Your rights will be determined by a neutral arbitrator, not a judge or jury. The Federal Arbitration Act governs the interpretation and enforcement of this Arbitration Agreement.
Web.TermsOfServiceText66: Prohibition of Class and Representative Actions and Non-Individualized Relief
Web.TermsOfServiceText67: YOU AND BitTube AGREE THAT EACH OF US MAY BRING CLAIMS AGAINST THE OTHER ONLY ON AN INDIVIDUAL BASIS AND NOT AS A PLAINTIFF OR CLASS MEMBER IN ANY PURPORTED CLASS OR REPRESENTATIVE ACTION OR PROCEEDING. UNLESS BOTH YOU AND BitTube AGREE OTHERWISE, THE ARBITRATOR MAY NOT CONSOLIDATE OR JOIN MORE THAN ONE PERSON’S OR PARTY’S CLAIMS AND MAY NOT OTHERWISE PRESIDE OVER ANY FORM OF A CONSOLIDATED, REPRESENTATIVE, OR CLASS PROCEEDING. ALSO, THE ARBITRATOR MAY AWARD RELIEF (INCLUDING MONETARY, INJUNCTIVE, AND DECLARATORY RELIEF) ONLY IN FAVOR OF THE INDIVIDUAL PARTY SEEKING RELIEF AND ONLY TO THE EXTENT NECESSARY TO PROVIDE RELIEF NECESSITATED BY THAT PARTY’S INDIVIDUAL CLAIM(S).
Web.TermsOfServiceText69: BitTube is always interested in resolving disputes amicably and efficiently, and most customer concerns can be resolved quickly and to the customer’s satisfaction by emailing customer support at hello@bittube.app. If such efforts prove unsuccessful, a party who intends to seek arbitration must first send to the other, by certified mail, a written Notice of Dispute ("Notice"). The Notice to BitTube should be sent to Wartenbergstrasse 41, CH-4052 Basel, Swizerland, Attn: Operations Department ("Notice Address"). The Notice must (i) describe the nature and basis of the claim or dispute and (ii) set forth the specific relief sought. If BitTube and you do not resolve the claim within sixty (60) calendar days after the Notice is received, you or BitTube may commence an arbitration proceeding. During the arbitration, the amount of any settlement offer made by BitTube or you shall not be disclosed to the arbitrator until after the arbitrator determines the amount, if any, to which you or BitTube is entitled.
Web.TermsOfServiceText72: Arbitration will be conducted by a neutral arbitrator in accordance with the German Arbitration Institute’s (DIS) rules and procedures, including the DIS’s Supplementary Procedures for Consumer-Related Disputes (collectively, the "DIS Rules"), as modified by this Arbitration Agreement. For information on the DIS, please visit its website, http://www.disarb.org/em/. Information about the DIS Rules and fees for consumer disputes can be found at the DIS’s consumer arbitration page, http://www.disarb.org/. If there is any inconsistency between any term of the DIS Rules and any term of this Arbitration Agreement, the applicable terms of this Arbitration Agreement will control unless the arbitrator determines that the application of the inconsistent Arbitration Agreement terms would not result in a fundamentally fair arbitration. The arbitrator must also follow the provisions of this Agreement as a court would. All issues are for the arbitrator to decide, including, but not limited to, issues relating to the scope, enforceability, and arbitrability of this Arbitration Agreement. Although arbitration proceedings are usually simpler and more streamlined than trials and other judicial proceedings, the arbitrator can award the same damages and relief on an individual basis that a court can award to an individual under this Agreement and applicable law. Decisions by the arbitrator are enforceable in court and may be overturned by a court only for very limited reasons.
Web.TermsOfServiceText73: Unless BitTube and you agree otherwise, any arbitration hearings will take place in a reasonably convenient location for both parties with due consideration of their ability to travel and other pertinent circumstances. If the parties are unable to agree on a location, the determination shall be made by DIS. If your claim is for €10,000 or less, BitTube agrees that you may choose whether the arbitration will be conducted solely on the basis of documents submitted to the arbitrator, through a telephonic hearing, or by an in-person hearing as established by the DIS Rules. If your claim exceeds €10,000, the right to a hearing will be determined by the DIS Rules. Regardless of the manner in which the arbitration is conducted, the arbitrator shall issue a reasoned written decision sufficient to explain the essential findings and conclusions on which the award is based.
Web.TermsOfServiceText75: Payment of all filing, administration, and arbitrator fees (collectively, the "Arbitration Fees") will be governed by the DIS Rules, unless otherwise provided in this Arbitration Agreement. If the value of the relief sought is €75,000 or less, at your request, BitTube will pay all Arbitration Fees. If the value of relief sought is more than €75,000 and you are able to demonstrate to the arbitrator that you are economically unable to pay your portion of the Arbitration Fees or if the arbitrator otherwise determines for any reason that you should not be required to pay your portion of the Arbitration Fees, BitTube will pay your portion of such fees. In addition, if you demonstrate to the arbitrator that the costs of arbitration will be prohibitive as compared to the costs of litigation, BitTube will pay as much of the Arbitration Fees as the arbitrator deems necessary to prevent the arbitration from being cost-prohibitive. Finally, if the value of the relief sought is €75,000 or less, BitTube will pay reasonable attorneys’ fees should you prevail. BitTube will not seek attorneys’ fees from you. But, if you initiate an arbitration in which you seek more than €75,000 in relief, the payment of attorneys’ fees will be governed by the DIS Rules.
Web.TermsOfServiceText77: All aspects of the arbitration proceeding, and any ruling, decision, or award by the arbitrator, will be strictly confidential for the benefit of all parties.
Web.TermsOfServiceText79: Without limiting the severability provision in the Section titled "General Provisions" of this Agreement, if a court or the arbitrator decides that any term or provision of this Arbitration Agreement other than clause (b) of this Arbitration Agreement is invalid or unenforceable, the parties agree to replace such term or provision with a term or provision that is valid and enforceable and that comes closest to expressing the intention of the invalid or unenforceable term or provision, and this Arbitration Agreement shall be enforceable as so modified. If a court decides that any of the provisions of clause (b) of this Arbitration Agreement is invalid or unenforceable, then the entirety of this Arbitration Agreement shall be null and void, unless such provisions are deemed to be invalid or unenforceable solely with respect to claims for public injunctive relief. The remainder of this Agreement will continue to apply.
Web.TermsOfServiceText81: Notwithstanding any provision in this Agreement to the contrary, BitTube agrees that if it makes any future change to this Arbitration Agreement (other than a change to the Notice Address) while you are a user of the Services, you may reject any such change by sending BitTube written notice within thirty (30) calendar days of the change to the Notice Address provided above. By rejecting any future change, you are agreeing that you will arbitrate any dispute between us in accordance with the language of this Arbitration Agreement.
Web.TermsOfServiceText83: This Agreement shall be governed by, and construed in accordance with, the laws of Germany, without regard to any choice of law, conflicts of law or other principles that would result in the applicable of the laws or regulations of any other jurisdiction.
Web.TermsOfServiceText84: This Agreement and the rights and obligations herein are personal to you, and you may not assign or otherwise transfer this Agreement or any of your rights or obligations hereunder, by operation of law or otherwise, without the prior written consent of BitTube. BitTube may freely assign this Agreement, including, without limitation, in connection with a merger, acquisition, bankruptcy, reorganization, or sale of some or all of our assets or stock.
Web.TermsOfServiceText85: If any one or more of the provisions of this Agreement are for any reason held to be invalid, illegal or unenforceable by a court of competent jurisdiction, the remaining provisions of this Agreement shall be unimpaired and shall remain in full force and effect, and the invalid, illegal or unenforceable provision(s) shall be replaced by a valid, legal and enforceable provision or provisions that comes closest to the intent of the parties underlying the invalid, illegal or unenforceable provision(s).
Web.TermsOfServiceText86: The failure of either party to exercise in any respect any right provided for herein shall not be deemed a waiver of any further rights hereunder. A waiver by either party of any term or condition of this Agreement or any breach thereof, in any one instance, will not waive such term or condition or any subsequent breach thereof.
Web.TermsOfServiceText87: If BitTube is unable to perform any obligation under this Agreement because of any matter beyond its reasonable control, such as lightning, flood, exceptionally severe weather, fire, explosion, war, civil disorder, industrial disputes (whether or not involving employees of BitTube), acts of local or central government or other competent authorities, problems with telecommunications providers, hostile network attacks or other events beyond BitTube’s reasonable control (each, a "Force Majeure Event"), BitTube will have no liability to you for such failure to perform; provided, however, that BitTube shall resume performance promptly upon removal of the circumstances constituting the Force Majeure Event. If any Force Majeure Event continues for more than sixty (60) days, either BitTube or you may terminate this Agreement by delivery of written notice to the other party. You will remain responsible for all Fees incurred through the last day the Services were available. If you and BitTube have executed a separate user Agreement applicable to your access to and use of the Site, Services and/or Software, then the terms and conditions of such Subscription Agreement shall prevail to the extent of any conflict with the terms and conditions of this Agreement. In all other cases, this Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between BitTube and you with respect to its subject matter, and supersedes all prior communications and proposals, whether electronic, oral or written, between BitTube and you. No waiver or modification of any of the provisions of this Agreement shall be binding unless in writing and signed by a duly authorized representative of each party.

indexBrowser.theBrowserThatRespect: The browser that respects your time and rewards your attention.
indexBrowser.enjoyAddFree: Enjoy ad-free, private and secure browsing with BitTube.
indexBrowser.isYourTime: It’s your time to take control
indexBrowser.howWebMonetization: BitTube reshapes how web monetization should work. Browse privately, ad free and support every publisher you visit. Your time powers the new attention economy without compromise.
indexBrowser.airtimeRewardsYouAndUsers: AirTime rewards you and the publisher while browsing the web. Reward any website, social account and creator with your time and donations.
indexBrowser.browseAdFree: Browse ad free and carefree with no worries about hurting a publisher’s revenue. AirTime monetizes every website and social account you visit.
indexBrowser.airtimeMonetizesAllContent: AirTime monetizes all content based on watch time. The extension embeds 'Donate TUBEs' buttons for instant donations on supported platforms.
indexBrowser.browseWithConfidence: Browse with confidence. We are not in the data business. The BitTube Browser is open source. You can fully customize your shield settings.
indexBrowser.extensionFeatures: The extensions includes VPN for free. Connect to a remote server to access geo-restricted content. Surf the web anonymously and securely. Available for desktop and mobile.
indexBrowser.linkItMonetizeIt1: Link your websites and social accounts to your BitTube account. Earn money when other BitTubers watch your content!
indexBrowser.linkItMonetizeIt2: Register your website or app and earn from your guest visitors as well. Learn more about the AirTime module
indexBrowser.takeYourWalletText1: Manage multiple addresses, send and receive funds directly within the browser. Import transaction history and monitor earnings from linked accounts and websites. Use your secret keys to restore your online wallets in the offline wallets.
indexBrowser.takeYourWalletText2: Independence from payment providers. Be your own Bank.
indexBrowser.ifYouHaveQuestions: If you have any other questions

transactionErrorText: 저희 지원팀과 연락하셔서 구매를 완료해 주십시오. 불편을 끼쳐드린 점 사과드립니다.
theCurrencyConversionRateChanged: 요청간 통화전환율이 너무 많이 바뀌었습니다, 다시 한번 시도해보십시오.
transactionErrorNote: We have confirmed your purchase. For security reasons, we check each transaction manually. You will receive the TUBE amount within 24 hours. Thank you
plusFeature3: Convert TUBE funds into local currency
toGetVerified: To get verified, please select Nationa ID and upload a photo of the back and front side, or select passport and upload a photo of the passport page with your details.
imagesWrong: One or more of the submitted documents or photos were not accepted. Please, check the marked document and upload a new image.
pleaseSelectTheDocuments: Please select the documents that you want to upload
uploadSelfieText: Upload a photo of your face while visibly holding a handwritten note and your identification document from the previous step. The note must include the code, current date and the word 'BitTube'. See the placeholder for reference:
nameAndSurname: Name and Surname written in Latin characters:
loginSocialMedia: Log in or sign up with a social account
